content: श्रौत {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (ती|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [श्रुतौ विहितं अण्] {@--1@} Relating to the ear. {@--2@} Relating to, founded on, or prescribed by, the Veda. {@--3@} Sacrificial. --तं {@--1@} Any observance prescribed by the Vedas. {@--2@} Ritual enjoined by the Vedas. {@--3@} Preservation or maintenance of the sacred fire. {@--4@} The three sacred fires collectively; ({%<ab>i. e.</ab>%} गार्हपत्य, आहवनीय and दक्षिण).
